programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Twenty years after the death of his father and brother at the hands of the English, Scottish rebel William Wallace returns to his homeland after becoming an expert in the arts of war . Forming a fierce military force from the villagers against the English, who murdered his secret bride.(n)

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: With their hands controlling the biggest media company in the world, the Logans remain as dysfunctional as they come, which is made more clear in the wake of the announcement of the family's patriarch that he is stepping down from his position.(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, the martial arts fighter Ah Sahm becomes entangled in the fight for dominance between the Chinese crime syndicates in Chinatown.(n)

programme.title: The Blue Elephant
programme.desc: Khan Kluay is the elephant of King Naresuan the Great. When his beloved falls pregnant, he's torn between staying with her or going to war.

programme.title: Legend of the Sea
programme.desc: The Eastern Sea, was once peaceful under the rule of the Dragon King, but all this was about to change when the evil octopus Ocho was released from banishment and unleashed to avenge the kingdom.

programme.title: Krazzy Planet
programme.desc: Life on planet Krazzy,is full of fun and prosperity,until a galaxy tyrant decides to invade the planet. Two brave heroes team up with a scientist to confront the invasion attempt to show the true essence of the people of planet Krazzy.

programme.title: Ivan the Incredible
programme.desc: The poor child Ivan Olsen is bullied at school, and his father doesn't make him feel special. But his life changes when he finds a magical potion that makes him amazing in everything for one day. He decides to use it to change his father's opinion about him and teach his bullies a lesson.

programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: The true story of a Nebraska cop who takes a job as a peacekeeper for the UN in post-war Bosnia and Herzegovina. What she thinks is a mission to help the war-torn country ends up revealing the corruption within the UN as she uncovers a human-trafficking ring that is being deliberately ignored.

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Mikey (Johnathon Schaech) and JP (Adrian Grenier) grew up together and only had each other to rely on. As adults, JP became a successful owner of a construction company, while Mikey became a small-time mobster. After mikey gets abducted by ruthless crime boss Eddie King (Nicolas Cage), and is held for ransom, JP turns to their old friend Detective Sal (John Cusack) for help.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: In a game of mind and control in the future, death row convicts are forced to participate in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage player, has to survive 30 sessions in order to be free.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Danny has been enslaved his whole life without receiving proper education, so he has the mind and personality of a little child. He is a skilled fighter, and his owner, Bart, treats him like a guard dog, complete with a collar. When an accident leaves Bart in a coma, Danny meets a blind man who helps him change his point of view about life.

programme.title: Disturbing the Peace
programme.desc: After a ruthless biker gang rolls into town looking to cause chaos, a former Texas Ranger with a troubled past is forced to stop them.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: (Arthur Bishop), an assassin, decides to put his criminal past behind him and move forward. He gets drawn back to the crime world after his nemesis abducted his girlfriend - Bishop now must execute three assassinations around the world, and make them appear as accidents, to save his girlfriend.

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: When Troy Holloway is trapped in a drifting escape pod headed to the sun, he realizes that the problem he's in is much bigger than he thought, as the oxygen is rapidly running out, his chances of survival are quickly declining.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Twenty years after the alien invasion that threatened the destruction of mankind, the alien mothership comes to Earth and the armies of the world have to work together to protect the planet from annihilation.

programme.title: Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever
programme.desc: Two opposing secret agents must set aside their differences, as they team up to fight a common enemy, who has developed a micro-device that can terminate the human race.

programme.desc: After the Wall Street broker Will and his son Danny witness the murder of a crooked police officer following a botched bank robbery, Will is forced to help the criminals recover the stolen money after they kidnap Danny.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.title: The 2nd
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Vic Davis must race against time to save his son after a group of terrorists kidnap him along with the daughter of a Supreme Court Justice.

programme.title: Results
programme.desc: The lives of a gym owner and one of his personal trainers are turned upside down when they get a wealthy client that forces them to confront their history and their feelings for each other.(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: When a sharp-witted college journalist attempts to unravel the secret behind a murder, her investigation leads her directly to fall for a handsome businessman, who turns out to be the murder's prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: David Wozniak discovers he has fathered over 500 children through donations to a fertility clinic twenty years ago. He wrestles with the decision to come forward or not when 142 of them file a lawsuit to find out who he is.(n)

programme.title: The Last Song
programme.desc: As is usually the case whenever parents get a divorce, their children lose faith in love and understanding. This is exactly what Ronnie goes through after her parents split up. That is until she goes to visit her father on Tybee island. Whilst there she rediscovers love and regains her faith in people.(n)

programme.title: Elvis & Nixon
programme.desc: On the morning of December 21, 1970 during the presidency of Richard Nixon , Elvis Presley asked for an interview with President Nixon at the White House, during the interview at the Oval Office, Elvis gave the oath as a secret agent for the Drug enforcement office.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.(n)

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: When the fatally-ill Martha moves into a retirement community to spend her last days in peace, the last thing she expects is for her fun-loving neighbor to convince her that there's still time to revive her old dream of being a cheerleader.(n)

programme.title: Admission
programme.desc: Portia Nathan, an experienced Princeton University Admissions Officer, is busy selecting the nation's best-fitting students. She is invited by her former college mate to visit his alternative high school and introduces a child prodigy, Jeremiah, as her secretly born and given away child. For the first time, her heart leads her to grant him an undeserved admission risking her pending promotion.(n)

programme.title: While We're Young
programme.desc: Josh and Cornella Srebnick, a couple in their forties, living in New York City seem to have the perfect life. But their marriage and professional life are put to the test when two younger couples, Jamie and Darby, enter their lives.(n)

programme.title: When in Rome
programme.desc: Beth works at the Guggenheim and is very good at her job, so good in fact that one may say that she is perhaps a bit “too good” at it. Love and romance have been forced to take a back seat in her life as she focuses all of her energies on her career. However, all of this changes when she travels to Rome to attend her sister’s wedding and gets to know Nicholas Beamon.(n)
